name: tab-tosser
description: Automatically close tabs that have been ignored for too long. Free yourself of digital clutter.

scripts.test: npm run build && node -r esm node_modules/qunit/bin/qunit
scripts.build:cp: cp LICENSE.txt dist/ && cp src/{manifest.json,icon.svg} dist/ && mkdir dist/lib && cp src/lib/{background.html,first-run.html,options.html,styles.css} dist/lib/
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:cp && npm run build:ts

author: Jeremiah Lee
